principle_items.subtitle_id: Kampus Cerdas adalah platform inovatif yang mendukung pembelajaran interaktif dan pengelolaan pendidikan secara digital untuk meningkatkan kualitas pendidikan di perguruan tinggi
principle_items.subtitle_en: Smart Campus is an innovative platform that supports interactive learning and digital management of education to enhance the quality of higher education institutions.

principle_items.subtitle_id: Transportasi pintar menggunakan teknologi modern seperti sensor dan data waktu nyata untuk meningkatkan pergerakan orang dan kendaraan. Hal ini membantu mengurangi kemacetan, mempersingkat waktu tempuh, dan meningkatkan keselamatan di jalan raya. Sistem ini juga mendukung transportasi yang lebih efisien dan ramah lingkungan.
principle_items.subtitle_en: Smart transportation uses modern technology like sensors and real-time data to improve how people and vehicles move. It helps reduce traffic, shorten travel times, and increase safety on the roads. This system also supports more efficient and environmentally friendly transportation.
Financial support for partner cash flow.
Access to marketing assets, events, and materials.
Direct support and training from engineering teams.
Receive direct sales leads from global marketing.
Topology design and product recommendation support.
Priority access to the newest technology.
